title: spack confused about location of global package with local hash

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
Spack gets confused about the location of global install of package with locally generated hash despite being given the location and modulefile. 


### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
$ spack install ... ^intel@2018.3.222
```

### Error Message

```
[sajid@apsxrmd-0001 jobs]$ spack install --keep-stage -v -j 10 petsc@develop+hypre+mpi+knl %intel@18.0.3 ^intel-mkl@2018.3.222 ^intel-mpi@2018.3.222 ^/573
==> intel-mpi@2018.3.222 : externally installed in /blues/gpfs/home/software/spack-0.10.1/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-18.0.3/intel-mpi-2018.3.222-4aoglyb6zfpaydn6iuiz63wyj3soolv2
==> intel-mpi@2018.3.222 : already registered in DB
...
==> intel-mkl@2018.3.222 : externally installed in /blues/gpfs/home/software/spack-0.10.1/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-18.0.3/intel-mkl-2018.3.222-6ff5hhpjd6k3y4uvcg4mrthoqj3e3ok4
==> intel-mkl@2018.3.222 : already registered in DB
==> Installing hypre
==> Searching for binary cache of hypre
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for hypre found: installing from source
==> Error: InstallError: Cannot locate core MKL libraries:
        ['libmkl_intel_lp64', 'libmkl_sequential', 'libmkl_core']

/blues/gpfs/home/sajid/packages/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/intel.py:761, in blas_libs:
        758            shared=('+shared' in self.spec))
        759        debug_print(mkl_libs)
        760
  >>    761        if len(mkl_libs) < 3:
        762            raise_lib_error('Cannot locate core MKL libraries:', mkl_libnames)
        763
        764        # The Intel MKL link line advisor recommends these system libraries
```
that activate the full debug output.

Does spack know of the existance of intel-mkl@2018.3.222 ? Yes.
```
[sajid@apsxrmd-0001 jobs]$ spack find -lv intel-mkl
==> 2 installed packages
-- linux-centos7-x86_64 / intel@17.0.4 --------------------------
vrmvwju intel-mkl@2017.3.196~ilp64+shared threads=none

-- linux-centos7-x86_64 / intel@18.0.3 --------------------------
qn7bzkv intel-mkl@2018.3.222~ilp64+shared threads=none
``` 

Does spack know where to find it ? No!
```
[sajid@apsxrmd-0001 jobs]$ spack location intel-mkl@2018.3.222
==> Error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/blues/gpfs/home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/intel-mkl-2018.3.222-qn7bzkvvpmexkr2kwgxikhv3pcebhglg'
```
